Name: Animal portal - Puzzle
About the game: In this game, players must navigate through a series of interconnected portals to reach the end goal. Each portal is guarded by a unique animal, and players must figure out the correct mechanical movement for each animal in order to progress. The game features beautiful fantasy graphics, immersing players in a magical world filled with colorful characters and environments. Whether you're a puzzle enthusiast or just looking for a fun and challenging way to pass the time, Animal Portal Puzzle is sure to provide hours of entertainment. Challenging puzzles to solve Variety of animals from all over the world to discover Stunning graphics Addictive gameplay Unlock new levels as you progress Available on multiple platforms (insert platforms) User friendly interface Regular updates with new levels and animals In-game hints and power-ups available to assist players.
